text:
If you have symptoms of #coronavirus, you should self-isolate and get yourself tested. 

Symptoms include: 
⚫ a high temperature 
⚫ a new continuous cough 
⚫ change or loss of smell or taste 

To book a test visit: https://t.co/LVuGupz3Pk https://t.co/a07bsZlyu0

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from UK authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Prime Minister, First Ministers, NHS and public health authorities across the UK. For more, visit www.nhs.uk/coronavirus

entity.name: COVID-19: Public health updates
entity.description: Information on how to take care of yourself and others from authorities and public officials.
